messages.messageBody:
www.southebys.com will connect you to a mickey mouse auctioneers who have
had the wit to register the name, try www.sothebys.com
Alan

messages.subject: Sotheby's Auction - Nov. 9 TSUBAs
messages.msgSnippet: All: Southeby s London auction info, and auction catalogue has been posted, Nice Tsuba s noted, including rare Yagyu . Southeby;s requires log on registration
messages.messageBody:
All: Southeby's London auction info, and auction catalogue has been posted,
Nice Tsuba's noted, including "rare Yagyu". Southeby;s requires log on
registration ... worth the effort. Go to Part 2 of the catalogue - You can run
search ... TSUBA for photos - scrip , Auction is scheduled for Nov. 9
